text: [ CHEERS AND APPLAUSE ] >> I LET MY LOOK DO THE TALKING.
>> MY BODY IS MY CANVAS, AND MY CLOTHES IS MY PAINT.
WHEN IT COMES TO FASHION, THERE'S NO RISK YOU WON'T TAKE.
WELL, CONGRATS ON BEING HOT, BUT THIS AIN'T FOR YOU.
INTRODUCING FASHION COWARD, THE ONLY STORE STORE FOR PEOPLE WHO
HATE SHOPPING AND FEEL LOST AND SCARED, WITH CLOTHES THAT
SUGGEST THE GENERAL IDEA OF A PERSON.
SO MANY SHIRTS ARE ALMOST NORMAL, BUT THEN THEY GO LIKE
THIS. WE KEEP IT SAFE WITH THINGS LIKE
BROWN SWEATER, NAVY SHIRT, PANTS FOR THE LEGS AND ONE BLACK DRESS
THAT SAYS KEEP IT MOVING. >> MY STYLE TELLS A STORY.
>> SAME. MY STORY IS I'M A STRANGER TO
MYSELF. >> I GO ON CRUISES WITH MY
PARENTS. >> IDEAL JUROR.
>> CAN'T DECIDE BETWEEN BUTTONS AND NO BUTTONS?
WE SPLIT THE DIFF WITH A WHOLE LOT OF THIS.
THAT'S A HALF TRAIL OF BUTTONS THAT SAY --
>> FAIL. FAIL, FAIL, FAIL.
>> AND YOU GOT TO TRY ON OUR BIG GRAY ZIP-UP SWEATSHIRT THAT
DOUBLES AS A REAL LIFE INVISIBILITY CLOAK.
>> TRY IT ON IN OUR COWARD PROOF FITTING ROOM.
AS A CHILD, YOU WERE HUMILIATED IN A KOHL'S FITTING ROOM WHERE
YOUR MOTHER SAID SOMETHING SO HARMFUL, IT SEARED OFF THE TOP
LAYER OF YOUR BRAIN. YOU'RE SAFE HERE WITH THINGS
LIKE FAR MIRRORS. >> THAT'LL DO.
>> IF AN ITEM OF CLOTHING MAKES YOU ASK, AM I THIS PERSON?
>> MAYBE FOR LIKE A ROOFTOP PARTY?
>> IT WILL IMMEDIATELY BURST INTO FLAMES.
DECISIONS ARE HARD. THAT'S WHY IF YOU TAKE MORE THAN
30 SECONDS TO DECIDE IF YOU WANT SOMETHING, THE FITTING ROOM
EMITS A MERCY GAS THAT KNOCKS YOU OUT.
THEN YOU'RE CARRIED HOME BY A BIG STRONG MAN WHO SHOPS FOR
YOU. AND WE DON'T SELL SWIMSUITS.
YOU KNOW WHY. FASHION COWARD.
